## Unlock Deeper Observability

Enterprise-Grade OpenTelemetry for superior application performance monitoring.

<ul>

<li><div style="display: flex; align-items: center;">Accelerate <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/OpenTelemetry-111?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64," /> implementation with <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Odigos-111?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64," /></div></li>

<li><div style="display: flex; align-items: center;">An <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/eBPF-111?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64," />-based solution providing zero-performance overhead for deeper tracing.</div></li>

<li><div style="display: flex; align-items: center;">Zero-code implentation!</div></li>

</ul>

## Getting Started:

#### 1. [Install Odigos](https://docs.odigos.io/quickstart/installation) in a Supported Environment:

![Kubernetes](https://img.shields.io/badge/Kubernetes-111?logo=kubernetes)
![Virtual Machine](https://img.shields.io/badge/Virtual_Machine-111?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

#### 2. Select Applications with the Supported Languages:

![Go](https://img.shields.io/badge/Go-111?logo=go)
![Java](https://img.shields.io/badge/Java-111?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
![Node.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/Node.js-111?logo=node.js)
![Python](https://img.shields.io/badge/Python-111?logo=python)
![.NET](https://img.shields.io/badge/.NET-111?logo=dotnet)

#### 3. Connect to a Supported Backend:

![AppDynamics](https://img.shields.io/badge/AppDynamics-111?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
![Axiom](https://img.shields.io/badge/Axiom-111?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
![AWS S3](https://img.shields.io/badge/AWS_S3-111?logo=amazons3)
